entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023
